title: Live from Helsinki, it's Typeradio!
content:
TYPERADIO PRESS ANNOUNCEMENT  
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

From today, the 16th of September, Typeradio will be on the air for the next 3 days. We will be broadcasting from the ATypI conference in Helsinki 24 hours a day.

Next to the live streaming, an archive of previous recordings is being build on our website. Yes, made for podcasting. Have Typeradio with you when you are jogging in the morning or any other time.

We just started broadcasting a couple of minutes ago. Listen through our website: [www.typeradio.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329210637/http:/www.typeradio.org/)

have 3 nice days,  
the Typeradio crew

â€”

Typeradio  
Type is speech on paper, Typeradio is speech on type  
 [http://www.typeradio.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329210637/http:/www.typeradio.org/)

Broadcasting right now live from Helsinki  
on air: 16-18 September 2005

Highlights from New York (20-24 July)  
now available as podcasts on the website
author: Miss Tiffany : 17 September, 2005 - 2:42am
